name: Paradigm Shift (itch)
description:
Paradigm Shift is a Local Multiplayer Battle Arena game where 1 to 4 players battle to the death while trying to find a way out of the arena.

However, the arena's exit is guarded by a sentry, and the players need to collect the components of a jamming device in order to bypass it.

In order to achieve their goals, the players can use Enhancements that power up their suit, as well as varied means of exploration.

Youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UsCPyzpkrcQ

CREDITS
